text: "Salve a ti, Nicaragua" (; "Hail to Thee, Nicaragua") is the national anthem of Nicaragua. ==Lyrics== Spanish original IPA transcription Poetic English translation [s틛al쑌 틛a t틛i, n틟ika쮊가톢wa 틛en t틛u sw틛elo] [퉇틛a n틛o 쮈쮊갓xe l틛a b틛o풪 d틛el ka쒦갎n] 洧 [n틛i s틛e t틛i쑌 k틛on s틛a콂토쬰 d틛e e쬸틛anos] [t틛u 토lo쬵틛oso pend틛on b틟ikol틛o쬫 洧 [b쮊갈툹e e쬸틛osa l틛a p틛a풪 틛en t틛u 풪j틛elo] [n틛a칧a emp틛a쑌 t틛u 토l틛o쬵a 틟inmo쬾틛al] [k틛e 틛el t쬬쒦가xo 틛es t틛u d틛i토no la포툵쮊간l] [틛i 틛el on틛o 틛es t틛u ens틛e쑈 t쬴umf틛al] [틛es t틛u ens틛e쑈 t쬴umf틛al] Hail to thee, Nicaragua! On thy land roareth the voice of the cannon no more, 洧 nor doeth the blood of brothers now stain thy glorious bicolour banner. 洧 Let peace shine beautifully in thy sky, and nothing dimmeth thine immortal glory, for labour is thy well-earned laurel and honour is thy triumphal emblem, is thy triumphal emblem! ==References== Category:North American anthems Category:National symbols of Nicaragua
title: Salve a ti, Nicaragua
